column4: "the gloom of the armory. "STOP THIS! NOW!"  Jon pulled himself to his feet. Donal"
"rapers put in.  "He broke my wrist;" Grenn said again; holding it out to Noye"
"you to go."  Jon stared sullenly at the smoke rising from the brazier; until Noye"
"and fought in a hundred battles. They said it was Donal Noye who'd forged King Robert"
"was Donal Noye who'd forged King Robert's warhammer; the one that crushed the life from Rhaegar"
""Yes; life;" Noye said. "A long life or a short one; it's up to you; Snow"
"Jon said warily. There was a trap here. He felt it closing around him.  Donal"
"Jon said warily. There was a trap here. He felt it closing around him.  Donal"
"a trap here. He felt it closing around him.  Donal Noye leaned forward; into Jon"
"he broke off to stare at Jon; a faint half smile on his lips. One-armed Donal"
"One-armed Donal Noye stood in the door of the armory. "The gods be with you; Snow"
"Mole's Town."  "We knew even before that; though;" Grenn said. "Rudge has been helping Donal"
""Rudge has been helping Donal Noye in the forge. He was there when the Old Bear"
